description: This file contains multiple configuration parameters, shell scripts, and embedded Python scripts for building and configuring the uClibc embedded C library within a Yocto/OpenEmbedded build environment. It includes metadata, build flags, patching, and customization routines specific to uClibc's configuration and compilation process.

methods.name: oe.utils.str_filter_out
methods.description: Filters out specified patterns from build flags.

methods.name: d.getVar
methods.description: Retrieves a variable value from the build data context.

methods.name: d.setVar
methods.description: Sets a variable value in the build data context.

methods.name: oe_runmake
methods.description: Command wrapper to invoke make in the build environment.

methods.name: find_cfgs
methods.description: Retrieves configuration files for the build process.
